description.value: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist. Also add +20 to Acrobatics Skill Tests when using the Jump Special Use for the purpose of reducing Fall Damage.

system.benefit: Reduce Distance of all falls by Agility Bonus Metres, ignoring it as if it didn't exist. Also add +20 to Acrobatics Skill Tests when using the Jump Special Use for the purpose of reducing Fall Damage.
